nodes.text: The Perception was a model of speeder bike produced by the SoroSuub Corporation during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The SoroSuub Perception was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic on July 22, 2015 as one of the items in the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack on the Cartel Market.
